mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of General Douglas MacArthur receiving a certificate from House Speaker John McCormack
mdRecord.dcterms:description: General of the Army Douglas MacArthur receives from the House Speaker John McCormack a certificate of appreciation authorized by Congress. At left is Vice President Lyndon Johnson. Congressman Arch Moore is in the background.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Johnson, Lyndon B (Lyndon Baines), 19081973
